title: Interpretation of seeing water coming out of the breast for a married woman

preview.html: The interpretation of seeing water coming out of a married woman’s breast is where the subconscious at that time creates messages of reality. In general, a person should search for an interpretation of seeing water coming out of a married woman’s breast and search for different interpretations of dreams that help him overcome difficulties, as well as find logical answers to all Questions that may come up. He has in mind and insomnia when he sees in a dream a disturbing vision. In this article we will study together the interpretation of seeing water coming out of the breast, whether for an unmarried, married or divorced woman.Interpretation of seeing water coming out of the chestInterpretation of seeing water coming out of the chest. There are different interpretations of seeing water He comes out of the box, and these interpretations follow the dreamer’s condition in her dream, as if she is married, the interpretation of the dream will differ from her. You are single, and divorced without divorce, and we know that if the dreamer’s situation is different. The meaning of the vision varies as a whole. It can be in a good condition or in a bad condition, and one must be alert and stay away from it. The following are interpretations of water coming out of the chest: A young woman dreams of milk coming out of her breast: a sign of pregnancy and childbirth. An old woman who dreams of milk coming out of her breast: She loses her money and becomes poor. A woman’s breast-feeding: a sign of illness. If the dreamer sees that he is breast-feeding his pregnant wife: she will give birth to a boy. If a pregnant woman dreams that she is breast-feeding another woman: this is a sign that she will give birth to a girl. To lengthen the breast in a dream until it touches the duck has different interpretations. These are: If the fortuneteller is a boy, it means death, if he is a man, it shows the pursuit of trivial things that displease God, and if he is. He is a man without children, then this indicates his poverty, and if the dreamer is a woman, then this indicates great sadness, according to what Ibn Sirin said. Because in her sadness, a woman clutches her chest and scratches it. Seeing water coming out of the breast of an unmarried woman. Seeing water coming out of the breast of a single woman. There are different cases in which a woman sees water coming out of her breasts. This woman may see her breasts full of milk or milk coming out of it, and this indicates money. . Prosperity and wealth are on their way to her, but the interpretation of seeing water coming out of the breast for an unmarried woman has implications that we will learn about as follows: Ibn Sirin says that seeing water coming out of the breast of an unmarried girl is a sign of her hearing happy news. Seeing water coming out of the breast is considered An unmarried woman is a good and promising sign that the girl will get married soon and marry someone very close to her. Also, seeing water coming out of a married woman’s breast indicates that she will marry a good and reliable man. Interpretation of seeing water coming out of the breast for a married woman. Interpretation of a dream about water coming out of a married woman’s breast, The woman’s nipple secretes fluid, and this fluid is used by the newborn, and the lack of fluid in her breast may cause her to press on it until ejaculation occurs. The woman’s nipples are filled with milk during the breastfeeding period in the natural position, and this is one of the important things that a married woman goes through. The following is the interpretation of a woman’s vision that water He comes out instead

title: Interpretation of a dream about driving a car for a married woman

preview.html: Seeing the consequences of driving a car shows the problems that the dreamer faces in his life, and if she is driving the car with her children and husband, this indicates that she will continue in life to take care of her children and husband. Interpretation of seeing driving a car in a dream for one girl: The unmarried girl who dreams of driving a car alone in the dream. She saw many The consequences that appeared to her on the way. The meaning indicates the future and that these single women face many problems. And the things that have stopped her for a long time in her life, and God knows best. And the unmarried woman seeing that she is driving a car for the first time in a dream. He could not walk well in the dream and was afraid It appears that this single woman is dealing with a big and disturbing matter in her life at this time. Her mind is very busy, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. She was the only girl who was riding in the car and her fiancé was next to her. She is driving the car in the dream and feels happy with him in the dream. It indicates that This single girl will see a lot of good things. And the happy person who lives with this dreamer girl. See also: The new car in a dream for women, single women, married women, and men. Interpretation of seeing a car driving in a dream for a married woman. If a woman sees in a dream that she is driving a car, and it breaks down a lot on the road and cannot Continuing on her way in the dream. Here it indicates that the married dreamer is facing some difficult matters in her life at this time and that she is going on the wrong path. Likewise, I saw in a dream a married woman trying to drive a car and her husband and children were with her in the car, but she could not drive. Meaning It indicates the bad psychological state that the dreamer is going through in this period. She sees a lot of frustration and despair in her life. It also indicates that the married woman is driving a car in the dream for the first time. He was trying to succeed in driving without causing accidents. It indicates that a married woman is trying To start something important to her for the first time in her life. And she feels afraid to go into it, but you will succeed, God willing. Interpretation of seeing driving a car in a dream for a divorced woman: The divorced woman dreams that she drives a car, and she was very happy because she could drive it herself in the dream. Here it indicates a future. The divorced woman sees in a dream that her husband is driving a car and she is trying to get out of it and does not want to continue with him on the road. Here it indicates that the divorced woman will see her husband returning to her again at this time in her life. But she will refuse to return to him. As for a divorced woman who sees a car in a dream and desperately wants to drive it, and in the dream there are many accidents. It appears that this divorced woman will face great obstacles in her future and on her path. She will feel many bad things in her life. Read also: Interpretation of seeing a car in The dream and its meaning. Interpretation of seeing a man driving a car in a dream and its meaning. If the dreamer saw in a dream that he was driving a car in a dream. He was happy to do that himself in the dream without seeing

title: Interpretation of the sea view from a high place by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing the sea from above, according to Ibn Sirin. In fact, the sea is one of the interpretive symbols that indicates some events that will happen in reality. Therefore, the interpretation of seeing the sea from a high place. These dreams are messages from God Almighty, which are sent to believing Muslims, and are represented by signs A certain dream that carries information about the events present in a person’s life, and it either indicates good news, or a warning against bad human behavior, as a warning of a danger coming to the life of the dreamer. Interpretation of the view of the sea from a high place by Ibn Sirin. In fact, the sea is considered one of the many dreams that people have. Which brings between them good and bad interpretations, so the interpretation of seeing the sea from above reveals a lot according to the dreamer, which we review through the following: It is worth noting that the sea in a dream indicates fear and anxiety, as well as confusion in some dreams. Thus, seeing the sea in a dream from a place High indicates the high status of the person who has the vision, who works in the field of work or in his family, etc. But if a man sees that he is looking at the sea from above, this indicates his closeness to people of influence and high positions. On the other hand, seeing the sea from above In the dream of a student of knowledge, it indicates that he achieves a distinguished position in knowledge and in the religious and secular sciences he possesses. In addition, a person’s view of the sea from above is evidence of the existence of extensive trade. See also: Interpretation of a dream about a friend of mine in a dream by the most famous scholars of interpretation. Interpretation Seeing and looking at the sea in a dream In addition, people call the sea treachery as a result of a large number of people drowning in it over the years, so the interpretation of seeing the sea from above is interpreted with different interpretations. According to interpretation scholars: It should be noted that seeing someone looking at the sea is a sign of the success that the dreamer will achieve in his life. Therefore, seeing the sea from above in an unmarried woman’s dream indicates her association with an influential person and a monument. But if she stands in a high place And looking at the beach, this is a sign of separation, if in a dream it is a married woman. Besides, seeing the sea passing over our heads and agitating, indicates problems that will arise in the future and perhaps the outbreak of war. See also: Dream interpretation of seeing a mute and deaf person in a dream For a married and single woman, the interpretation of a dream about standing in the sea in a dream. Therefore, the interpretation of seeing the sea from above has many different meanings, in addition to the possibility of obtaining indications of future events that will occur in the future, which are represented in various aspects related to the vision of the dreamer himself. Standing in the sea: In fact, seeing the sea and standing on it in a dream and its waves are calm indicates the comfort and stability experienced by the dreamer. However, if a married woman sees herself standing on the seashore, this is evidence of the stability of her married life if the waters are calm. Therefore, seeing a girl is not A married woman standing in the sea is a sign of her imminent marriage. Also, seeing a pregnant woman standing on the seashore d

title: Eyebrows in a dream and the interpretation of a dream about cutting an eyebrow by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Scholars’ interpretations of the presence of eyebrows in a dream Eyebrows are present in many creatures, and if we look at the sons of Adam, they are present in both men and women, but they can have normal forms in men, as is the case for women, some of whom adorn them and define their shape, and for the sake of knowledge, the Messenger, may God bless him and grant him peace, also forbade the appearance of eyebrows in a dream, we explain a lot to you, as their interpretations differ from man to woman and in their appearance or natural appearance. It can be plucked, for example. The symbol of the eyebrows in a dream. The hairy eyebrow symbolizes sustenance and money. Also, the connection of the eyebrows to each other and their appearance in the dream in this way indicates the stability that the dreamer enjoys in his life. Whoever sees gray hair invading his eyebrows in a dream will witness a change in the condition of his wife, son, or one of his relatives. The long eyebrow of a man in a dream can symbolize anger quickly. It is said that eyebrows that fall or shave in a man's dream symbolize the death of the parents. A man who sees himself losing his eyebrows in a dream may be disobedient to his parents. A man who sees femininity in his eyebrows may be a doll without manliness. Changing the color of the eyebrow in a dream for a man indicates a change in his behavior. What does it mean for a single woman to see eyebrows in a dream? The beautiful eyebrows that appear on a single girl in a dream may be news of her imminent engagement and marriage. In other interpretations of seeing the eyebrows of an unmarried girl, Ibn Shaheen says that this dream means the father and mother, and seeing these two eyebrows pushes each eyebrow back and separates each An eyebrow from the other, and this means a lot of family problems that the girl suffers from with her. Family, regardless of its distance from its family and the distance of its family from each other. Also, separating the eyebrows in a person's dream can indicate parting with a beloved and beloved person. Eyebrows in Imam al-Sadiq's dream The appearance of the eyebrows in white means that the person will have a long and long life. Its appearance in black indicates good deeds. If the eyebrows in the dream are close to the hair of the head, this means that the seer will reach a very high position. Its proximity to the eye is an improvement in conditions. Making eyebrows in a dream A woman who makes her eyebrows in a dream but without a positive change in the appearance of the eyebrow, this is a harbinger of something bad in her life soon. Whoever sees that her eyebrows have grown in a dream and appear swollen, this indicates that he will soon make a mistake, and her eyebrows in general in a dream, his eyesight is not good. A woman who sees in her dream that her eyebrows are thin, this is a sign of great cunning and malice. With us inside the Egyptian dream interpretation site from Google you will find everything you need. Eyebrows falling in a single woman's dream If an unmarried girl sees that her eyebrows If they fall out in a dream, it may mean that one of her relatives will be affected by an illness or that God’s judgment will be executed on him by death. Long eyebrows for a woman show self-neglect. To dream of one eyebrow falling out is unpleasant and an indication of sadness and loss. The interpreters said that the dream

title: What is the interpretation of a dream about drowning in the sea by Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about drowning in the sea: It is one of the visions that express many different elements and interpretations depending on the dreamer’s condition, according to what was stated in the interpretation books of major scholars, especially the scholar Ibn Sirin. And other interpretations. Interpretation of a dream about drowning in the sea: Drowning in the sea in a dream indicates that the dreamer will fall into many mistakes and sins, and this vision is not only a harbinger for the dreamer, but it promises good news at his feet to seek repentance and seek forgiveness for his sins. And if the dreamer sees another person he knows drowning and saves him, This indicates that the dreamer helps this person get rid of a problem. The dreamer drowned in the dream and was in good health and did not get tired of the waves in the dream, so he will obtain a prominent position and this person will achieve what he seeks despite the obstacles that stand before him. Whereas if the dreamer helps someone He warns his children of drowning in the sea, in reality he helps them in their awakening to solve a problem. As for whoever sees himself drowning and survives while in reality he is sick, then his skin is better than God curing him of this disease. Whoever dreams of drowning in a clear and clean sea and can see the bottom clearly, it is good news. From God and that the dreamer will receive huge sums of money. Interpretation of a dream about drowning in the sea by Ibn Sirin. Drowning in the sea in a dream until death in a dream is evidence that he is immersed in sins and transgressions and lives the life of this world without realizing his story later, and the vision serves as a signal for the dreamer to think With it. His life, matters of his religion, and working for his afterlife so that he does not suffer from the torment of Hell. If the dreamer sees himself drowning in the sea while he is sick in reality, this is evidence that he will die because of his illness. He sees himself drowning in a dream and has good strength, and he did not die from drowning, then he has a request. From a king or a sultan and he can reach him and get what he wants easily. Whoever sees himself going down to the sea and drowning in it, then someone with great power will harm and hurt him. Whoever dreams that he dives and then floats again trying to move his arms and legs in order to survive, he will have prestige and a lot Of money. When an infidel sees himself drowning in the sea and dies by drowning, he joins the religion of Islam and is righteous and adheres to the teachings of the religion and stays away from everything that displeases God Almighty. As for whoever sees himself drowning and reaching the bottom of the sea, he will be punished severely by the strong or powerful. Whoever sees someone drowning And it helps him survive, as he saves his friend from calamity. You have a dream that confuses you. Wait for it.. Google, the dream interpretation website on the Internet. Interpretation of a dream of drowning in the sea for unmarried women. She drowned in the sea in a dream for a woman and saw in her fish of all kinds, then this is a sign of the livelihood that she will obtain and it will be many. Perhaps her wealth will provide her with many other things as well. He will notice. Seeing yourself drowning in the sea for single people does not bode well at all, especially if the sea is turbulent and scary, dark in color and full of evil and strange fish, then this is a sign of a difficult situation. But if a single woman dreams that she is drowning in the sea and sees someone she knows helping her, then this A positive sign that she will get help and success in solving her problems with the same person.Mother

title: Interpretation of mint in a dream

preview.html: We present to you in detail the interpretation of mint in a dream. The world of dreams and visions comes to represent a world full of mysteries and secrets that a person is always looking to uncover and to know what his secrets are to the owners of these dreams. The ancient Sumerian civilization was the first human civilization to care about interpreting the connotations of visions and interpreting their meanings, as the Greeks considered dreams a gift A divine symbol sent by the gods to man to convey something to him or to warn him against evil. Muslim scholars such as Ibn Khaldun, Ibn Sirin, and Ibn Shaheen wrote entire books and volumes on the detailed interpretation of the meanings of these dreams, which represented his historical transition to the science of dream interpretation. Therefore, today we present to you the interpretation of the meanings of mint in a dream from the Encyclopedia website. Interpretation of mint in a dreamGreen mint is a vegetable. Leafy greens, which have many beneficial physical and psychological effects on human health, but what about their effects in a dream, you will find them in the following lines according to the interpretations of the great Islamic scholar Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin attributed seeing mint in a dream to a sign of goodness and blessing and spreading joy in life in general, Mint in a dream heralds a change in circumstances for the better. Eating mint in a dream indicates kindness and justice. While if mint comes in a dream in a withered form and is yellow in color, it is a sign of fatigue and illness, and rotten mint comes in a dream to warn of calamities, problems, and sorrows in the dreamer’s life, and God is Most High and knows best. Interpretation of seeing mint in a dream For a single woman: Green mint comes in an unmarried girl’s dream to signify her longevity and health, God willing. If an unmarried woman sees fresh and blooming green mint in her dream, this is good news that she will soon hear good and happy news. A single woman eating mint in her dream shows her generosity and good morals. For single people to drink mint in a dream is a sign of the stability of their psychological state, their prosperity, and their recovery from any health damage or illness. Interpretation of seeing mint in a dream for a married woman: Seeing a married woman made of mint in a dream is a happy thing, as if the married woman saw herself putting a necklace of mint flowers on her neck. Her head, this is good news of joy and happiness that will happen to her soon. But if a married woman sees green mint leaves on her table, this is a sign of eating a lot, as it often indicates that she is going for Hajj or Umrah, God willing. Seeing a married woman using mint in Her kitchen and adding it to food indicates goodness and blessing, and it also indicates the spread of psychological and familial peace and stability for her and her family. Likewise, if a married woman sees herself perfuming her house with the scent of mint, this is a sign of happy news and happy events for her and her family soon. The interpretation of seeing mint in a dream for a pregnant woman comes Mint in a pregnant woman's dream indicates health and well-being. If a pregnant woman sees herself picking mint leaves, her birth will be easy

title: Interpretation of a dream about lettuce by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about lettuce in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi, it is considered one of the happy dreams that can come to a person during his sleep to convey a message or a specific indication of the occurrence of a certain thing, whether it is good or bad. It is known that lettuce is a vegetable that contains many nutrients, including minerals and vitamins that are important for the body. Which helps in the growth and building of muscles, and in this article we will tell you the interpretation of the dream of lettuce. Seeing lettuce can indicate problems and troubles, diseases and lack of financial resources, and fresh green lettuce can indicate good health. Interpretation of the dream of lettuce by Ibn Sirin The scholar Ibn Sirin cited several interpretations of this vision, including: Seeing lettuce in a dream means farewell or separation, such as the separation of a lover or the separation of a mother from her son due to a trip. If the owner of the dream is sick and sees this vision in a dream, this means that he will recover from the illness in the coming period, because lettuce contains important nutrients for the body. If the lettuce in the vision is red, this means that in the coming period the person will have many successful social relationships that will help him improve his life for the better. If the lettuce is black, this indicates unpleasant news or something sad that happens. Interpretation of seeing lettuce for a single girl If the girl dreams that she sees lettuce growing, this means for her that she will hear a lot of bad news, but this news will be followed by the appearance of many happy things for her. If the dream is that an unmarried girl buys lettuce, this means good news. If you see that you Buying lettuce for individuals means that you will get a lot of money and fulfill your desires. When an unmarried woman cuts lettuce in a dream, this means that she will get rid of all the problems and worries in her life. Seeing lettuce being planted in an unmarried woman's dream indicates the fulfillment of all desires in life. This vision may indicate the girl's separation from her lover. Interpretation of a dream about lettuce in a dream for a married woman There are many interpretations of this vision for a married woman, which are: Dreaming of lettuce in a dream Seeing lettuce in a dream indicates that the married woman is in good health and her psychological life is stable. If the vision that a married woman sees in her dream is that lettuce is growing, this means that she has some evils in her life, but she will be able to get rid of them. If the vision that a married woman cuts lettuce in a dream means for her that she will get rid of all the obstacles and problems in her life. Seeing her eating lettuce in a married woman's dream means that she bears some responsibility. If a married woman eats lettuce in a dream and it tastes delicious, this means that all her wishes will come true. Interpretation of seeing lettuce for a married man Seeing lettuce in a married man's dream means that he will live a decent life with His wife without problems or complications and life is simple. If a married man sees lettuce growing in a dream, this means that he is unable to solve problems. Buying lettuce in a married man’s dream means for him that he is in a hurry to take

title: What is the interpretation of seeing my sister pregnant in a dream?

preview.html: Seeing my sister pregnant in a dream Seeing pregnancy is a happy thing for many people, but seeing an unmarried sister pregnant in a dream, does this dream’s meaning and interpretations indicate good or bad, and this is what we will explain through this article in the following lines. The heart of the dreamer is reassured and not distracted between many different interpretations. Seeing my sister pregnant in a dream. Many of the most important interpretive scholars said that seeing my sister pregnant in a dream means that the dreamer will receive many new and happy events, joys, and many circumstances that will occur in her life in the coming days, if She wanted God. Many of the most important interpretation experts have also confirmed that seeing my sister pregnant while the dreamer is sleeping indicates that she will achieve many wonderful successes that will give her a good future in the coming periods. Seeing my sister pregnant in a dream means that the dreamer will be able to achieve all her goals and ambitions that will make her a position. And a prominent position in society during the coming period. Seeing my sister pregnant in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The great scholar Ibn Sirin said that seeing my sister pregnant in a dream is one of the dreams promising the coming of goodness, which indicates the positive changes that will occur in the life of the dreamer in the coming periods and will turn for the much better. He stressed The scholar Ibn Sirin said that seeing my sister pregnant while she is sleeping is a sign that God will fill her life with many blessings and gifts and open wide doors of sustenance for her in the coming periods. Seeing my sister pregnant in a dream means that the dreamer will receive a lot of good news that will greatly please her heart and make her You feel a lot of joy and happiness in the coming days. title: Interpretation of a dream about wearing shoes in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of the dream of seeing wearing shoes in a dream from the Mohazat website. I hope to provide you with everything you are looking for in our distinguished website that you like. Ibn Sirin interpreted the dream by dreaming of slippers, saying: It indicates a trip to the sea, and wearing weapons is paradise, and new slippers are an escape from adversity and protection from money. You can see: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a ring in a dream. If he does not have a weapon, then it is severe anxiety, and his distress is the greatest anxiety. And it was said: Tight slippers are debt, prison, and chains. If they are large, then they are in terms of money, and if they are new, then they are for protection, then they are better for their owner. If they are personal: then they are weaker for protection, and if they are for anxiety, then they are wiser, as they are farther away from relief. With clothes and pajamas, it is an extra. . In his prestige and abundance of livelihood. Slippers in the winter are better, and in the summer they are, and if he sees the slippers and does not wear them, then he will take money from a foreigner, and the loss of the slippers is due to the prevention of the loss of adornment. If it is attributed to anxiety and religion, then it is a relief from them, and wearing simple slippers is evidence of marriage with a virgin. If it breaks under his feet, this indicates a marriage in the cloth, and if it is lost or broken, he will divorce his wife. If he sells the slippers, the woman dies, and if he sees that he jumped on his heels A wolf or a fox: it is immoral to kill him in relation to his wife. Whoever wears slippers defiles the woman, and if there is a patch on the bottom of the slippers: he will marry a woman who has a child. Wearing red slippers for someone who wants to travel is undesirable. Wearing shoes in a dream for Nabulsi. As for Nabulsi, he interpreted the dream by dreaming of slippers: In a dream, this indicates a servant, money, and protection from misfortunes. Wearing tight slippers indicates anxiety, distress, and demand for debts. Perhaps the slippers represent a tight restriction on the man. Whoever sees that he has removed them will be relieved of worry and anxiety, and wearing bright slippers indicates an increase in prestige and an abundance of food. It is said that the dream of slippers with the arrival of winter portends goodness, and when it leaves or summer portends distress, and whoever sees that his slippers fell into a well Or they were burned, and his wife died. If the new sandals are narrow, then it is a required debt, and if they are wide, then they are a burden. The sandals are the property of a non-Arab who keeps quiet or travels, so if he sees the sandals and does not wear them, then he will take money from a non-Arab. Whoever wears simple sandals will travel far or near, Or he marries a virgin, and if he has wide sandals, the woman wears them. If the sandals fall into a well or are lost, he must leave them, and if he sells them, he dies. If a wolf or a fox jumps in his sandals, then they are sinners and follow his wife. If he wears sandals with a patch on the bottom, then he marries a woman. She has a son, and whoever loses his old slippers loses his debt. And the slippers cross the livestock. Every accident that happens to the slippers happens to his livestock, and everyone who goes for the slippers goes half of his money. And if his slippers go with him, all his money goes, and they said that the old slippers are debts and imprisonment. The slippers are a wife, and whoever sees that he finds a slipper It is clear that he is preoccupied with his worldly life for the sake of his future, or that he has missed his duty and makes it easy for many to live in. A light camel in a dream symbolizes strength and travel. Maybe Dale fell back in her role at the full moon or was painful.Or start things off and have a good hypothesis

title: Interpretation of seeing a wedding in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a wedding in a dream: Marriage is God’s law on earth, and it is for the reproduction and preservation of the human race. It is a sign of God’s love and mercy, and in a dream it indicates goodness, happiness, and the fulfillment of desires. Interpretation of seeing marriage in a dream, whether the vision is about a single woman, married, pregnant, or Absolute, and we will present it today through the Roya website. We will refer to it. Interpretation of seeing a wedding inside the dream in detail, based on the opinion of great translators such as Ibn Sirin, Ibn Kathir, al-Nabulsi, Imam al-Sadiq or modern-day interpreters, so follow us on the Roya website. Interpretation of seeing marriage in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Watching a man’s wedding Married to a beautiful woman indicates a prestigious job and a satisfactory salary. If a man sees that his wife has married someone else, he announces a promotion at work. Seeing a man marrying a talented woman. Buying a luxury car and a new and distinctive property indicates pride, prestige and prosperity. Seeing marrying a dead woman indicates achieving the impossible and things that I lost hope of gaining it. Interpretation of seeing marriage in a dream for a man. If a man sees that he married a famous woman and she was beautiful, this indicates that he achieved what he desired and the doors of nourishment were opened for him. Seeing marriage to an ugly woman in a young man’s dream portends the coming of evil and disappointment. If a man sees that he married a divorced woman Or a widow, this indicates a year full of gifts and satisfying the desire for life. Interpretation of seeing a wedding in a dream for a single woman: If a girl sees that she is marrying a handsome and elegant young man, it indicates good luck and the fulfillment of her dreams and aspirations. If an unmarried girl sees that she is marrying a young man and does not see Any destination, this may indicate the pitfalls and obstacles facing her life’s path, but she will face them with defiance and strong will. If a girl sees that she has married a foreign man, this may indicate achieving a bright future and a great month in her field of work and expertise. Interpretation of seeing a wedding in a dream for a married woman: If a married woman sees that she is marrying her husband, it indicates happiness and stability in her life and may indicate a new baby. If a married woman sees that she is marrying a famous person, it indicates a business partnership and benefit between them, or a friendship relationship, and perhaps an interest that will generate a lot of money for them. If a pregnant woman sees that she married an unknown man, it means that her situation has changed from poverty to wealth and she can move to a higher and more spacious place to live. That she got married again, this portends a lot of goodness, money, health, family happiness, and her happiness with the new baby. Interpretation of seeing a wedding in a dream for a divorced woman and a widow. If a divorced woman sees herself getting married again, this may indicate her return to her ex-husband or a new marriage, and she may get a job that earns a lot. of money and achieves wide fame and success in her field of work. If a widow sees that she married her deceased husband or married someone other than her husband, it indicates her good condition and the condition of her husband.
